long_description: Nikwax(R) Softshell(TM) Proof provides spray-on water repellency and revives breathability for today's modern gear. Recommended for Gore Windstopper(R), Polartec Windbloc(R) and Schoeller(R) fabrics. One bottle is enough to treat one to two garments depending on the condition of fabric being treated. For best results always clean item first with Nikwax Tech Wash(R) (sold separately).
short_description: Nikwax(R) Softshell(TM) Proof provides spray-on water repellency and revives breathability for today's modern gear.
